title: stuffed aubergines with Moorish spices and Manchego cheese
description: These soft and tender aubergines filled with lamb ragu and topped with Manchego cheese are really delicious.
ingredients: 1 large red pepper, seeds removed, chopped
1 tsp pimentón dulce (smoked sweet Spanish paprika)
large pinch of crushed dried chillies
6 tbsp tomato sauce (see Top recipe tip below)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
